message.body: Thanks for such a nice night! I spent the better half of today reworking my cv- (!)... Should I send it to Wendy? Are you home from teaching?
Will be home late tonight! I would def send yr CV! I haven't emailed them yet but will tonight!
Cool! I'll send Wendy a note today with my cv attached and if you send her a little message that would be sweet! And we would get to see each other more!!
I sure will!! It was also nice seeing you !
Hey LINDSEY send a note to Pete? Wendy said he does th hiring for pt faculty
I certainly will!!! I had no idea i will send him a not as soon as I get home.
Sorry to bug you. Love yiu
I sent peter an email! Let me know what happens!!!
